snippet.title: DOFUS Touch – A world of adventure at your fingertips!
snippet.description:
The world of DOFUS is just a few swipes away!
Step into an incredible world jam-packed with adventures, magic and fun with DOFUS Touch. Choose your character from the 15 available classes, and develop its skills through 200 experience levels. With battles, quests, dungeons, guilds, alliances, PvP and amazing creatures, all that’s missing is you!
Set off now for the World of Twelve to hunt down the Dofus, dragon eggs that grant their bearer fantastic powers. Ever since they were stolen, harmony has turned into chaos… The World of Twelve needs you!
The fate of your character is in your hands. Choose the god it will follow throughout the adventure, select its specialisations and professions, and create a formidable warrior all your own!
With its tactical, turn-based gameplay and a rich, original universe, DOFUS Touch is sure to delight fans of tablet-based MMORPGs. Interact with thousands of players who all want the same thing as you: to enter the legend!

For more info, visit: http://www.dofus-touch.com/en
